sentences.en: A gust of breeze moved down the hillside, ruffling the grass.
sentences.cn: 一阵微风吹下山坡，使青草如波浪起伏。

sentences.en: A gust of happiness swept through her.
sentences.cn: 一股幸福的暖流流遍她的全身.

sentences.en: A gust of wind blew the front door shut.
sentences.cn: 一阵大风吹来,把前门关上了.

sentences.en: A gust of wind caught the parachute.
A gust of wind drove down the valley.
A gust of wind fluttered the shavings wood.
sentences.cn: 一阵风把刨花吹得到处乱飞.

sentences.en: A gust of wind knocked him off balance and he fell face down in the mud.
sentences.cn: 一阵大风刮得他失去平衡，脸朝下摔在泥里。

sentences.en: A gust of wind made the candles flare.
A gust of wind pried loose a section of sheet-metal roofing.
sentences.cn: 一阵狂风把铺在屋顶上的一块金属片掀起来了。

sentences.en: A sudden gust of cold wind made me shiver.
sentences.cn: 一股突然刮来的冷风吹得我打哆嗦.

sentences.en: A sudden gust of wind blew his sunshade inside out.
sentences.cn: 一阵狂风把他的遮阳伞给吹翻了.

sentences.en: As she went past there was a gust of strong perfume.
sentences.cn: 她走过时有一股浓烈的香水味。

sentences.en: During the night a gust of wind had blown the pot over.
sentences.cn: 夜里一阵劲风将锅吹翻了。

sentences.en: The balloon soared up on a gust of wind.
sentences.cn: 一阵狂风把气球吹向风中.

sentences.en: The leaves were caught up by a sudden gust of wind.
sentences.cn: 突然一阵风把树叶吹起.

sentences.en: There was a gust of wind and then it began to pour.
sentences.cn: 刮了一阵风,跟着就下起了大雨.

words.tran_cn: 阵风的；突发的；阵阵猛急的

trans.tran_cn: 一阵狂风，风味，突发的一阵，（感情）迸发
trans.tran_en: a short, strong, sudden rush of wind
if the wind gusts, it blows strongly with sudden short movements
